summary: Identified root cause: roadmap update feature works correctly but ROAD_MAP.md has zero (Task N) patterns to match. The exact-match-only strategy (from task 638) has no targets. Title fuzzy matching (deferred to task 639, never implemented) is the missing piece. Recommend implementing keyword-based title matching with 2+ keyword threshold.
